data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Negrete, Lisandro, Brusa, Francisco (2017): Increasing diversity of land planarians (Platyhelminthes: Geoplanidae) in the Interior Atlantic Forest with the description of two new species and new records from Argentina. Zootaxa 4362 (1): 99-127, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4362.1.5|10 occurrences
